modName: Solstheim Severin Manor Master Bedroom Library
summary: Rearranges objects inside Player's house on Solstheim, nothing removed but 9 extra bookshelves added near master bedroom. Total 540 book space right next to your bed.
descriptionHtml:
F - fixed seams on the ground

Requires Dragonborn.

I got really tired of searching for a good place for my books. Sadly, Hearthfire did not provided me with desired solution, neither did other mods.
So here it is, small mod that adds 9 extra bookshelves near master bedroom, allowing for total 540 books in near vicinity of player sleeping area.

No items have been deleted, but moved around. Chests are under display cases, severin safe next to the bed, tables went to different rooms.

Known issues:
If you install it after visiting Severin Manor, some objects will be displaced. Skulls, baskets etc, all can be picked up though.

[b]Installation[/b]
Manual. Download archive, unzip into Skyrim/Data/ folder, make sure it is at the bottom of mods list.

[b]Uninstallation[/b]
Manual. Remove all objects you want to keep from bookshelves, exit house, save game, delete plugin from Skyrim/Data/ .
author: sir Evans
